"Guardian. I too have a request.": "When my brother and I were young, I gave him a gift that made him very happy. I believe the occasion has come to make that gift again."
"It requires paper and a quill pen. The paper I have acquired, but I cannot find a quill pen anywhere..."
"I thought that perhaps I could make one myself, but I have no feathers to use as materials."
"I regret to impose upon you, but could you procure me a feather?"
